headline: Baker Hughes Announces Dates for Third-quarter Earnings Release and Webcast
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Sept. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR) will announce the results of the third quarter ending Sept. 30, 2025, via press release at 5 p.m. Eastern Time (4 p.m. Central Time) on Thursday, Oct. 23, 2025. A webcast to discuss the results will be held Friday, Oct. 24, at 9:30 a.m. Eastern Time (8:30 a.m. Central Time). To access the webcast, listeners should visit the Baker Hughes website at: investors.bakerhughes.com. An archived version will be available on
